Package com.app.application.services

Class StreamServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.application.services.StreamServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
StreamService
@Service public class StreamServiceImpl extends Object implements StreamService
Servicio para recuperar contenido multimedia y portadas de series.
